page.title: 03Visitors to our area.
page.content: For most of the year our area is quiet and peaceful but in the summer months thousands of tourists and visitors swarm into the area.There are numerous attractions for them in the Royal Park,with its many square miles of peaceful countryside and the wonderful trees and shrubs.Very few cars are allowed within the park which makes it a quiet and safe place for families. There is also the attraction of the River Thames,probably one of the loveliest rivers in the country and in the summer its banks are swarming with people just lazing around watching the boats go up and down the river.On a hot summer's day it can be hard to find a space on the river bank but in the winter peace returns to our area.
